participant_1.name: Hiroshi
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about teaching. Enjoys sharing knowledge with students and has a warm demeanor.
participant_1.background: I teach both japanese and drawing classes. My dogs name is wonton. I am still single at the age of 35. I came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and energetic, loves to express creativity through makeup and engages with her audience.
participant_2.background: I make videos about makeup. My dad is an airline pilot. My car is pink. I am a youtube.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I make videos about makeup.
Oh, that's cool! I love makeup.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, draw, and spend time with my dog.
That sounds great! I love to draw too.
What kind of things do you draw?
I draw a lot of anime characters.
Oh, that's awesome! I love anime.
Thanks! I'm glad you do.
So, what's it like being a YouTuber?
It's really fun! I get to meet a lot of people and share my love of makeup with them.
That sounds really cool.
It is! I love it.
What's the most fun thing you've done as a YouTuber?
I got to go to Japan for a makeup convention.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
It was so much fun! I got to meet so many amazing people and see so many beautiful places.
That sounds incredible.
It was! I'm so glad I got to do it.
I'm sure you're going to continue to do amazing things.
